backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types (User, Role, Status, Layanan, Task, etc.) and implementing user management, service/task workflows, financial calculations, partner assignments, and approval systems with access control and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, styles, and configuration files with their functionality descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, sidebar, charts, and other UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication flow, superadmin claim, user profile loading, and role-based routing to appropriate dashboards (Partner, Client, Internal, or Admin) using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/ActivateServiceM: Modal component for activating services with dropdowns for selecting clients and asistenmu users, service type selection, unit quantity and price inputs with currency formatting, and effective hours/GMV calculations.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard displaying pending user registrations with approve/reject actions, statistics cards showing pending/approved/rejected counts, and tables for legacy approvals and all users with status badges.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalStatusBa: Displays a banner showing the user's approval status (approved or pending) using the useIsCallerApproved hook with appropriate icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/ApprovedUserView: Main routing component that displays AdminDashboard for admin users, PendingApprovalView for unapproved users, or a placeholder dashboard for approved non-admin users.
Full-featured client dashboard for managing tasks, viewing active services, creating new tasks, approving estimates, and editing profile with WhatsApp integration. (Content truncated)
frontend/src/components/ClientRegisterPa: Client registration page that handles Internet Identity login and collects client information (name, company, phone, email) for registration. (Content truncated)
frontend/src/components/EditRoleModal.ts: Modal dialog component for admins to update user roles with a dropdown selector, displaying current role and principal ID with save/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/InternalDashboar: Internal staff dashboard showing pending user approvals with approve/reject actions, service activation modal access, and role-based permissions for finance/admin users. (Content truncated)
frontend/src/components/InternalSystemPa: Internal system portal page that handles Internet Identity login, role-based registration for internal staff (admin, finance, concierge, etc.), and redirects authenticated internal users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page component featuring hero section, service cards with expandable details, navigation to partner/client portals, and WhatsApp contact integration.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Reusable authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and supports default and hero variants.
frontend/src/components/PartnerDashboard: Partner dashboard page displaying partner profile information (ID, name, city, status) with header navigation and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/PartnerPortalPag: Partner registration portal that handles Internet Identity login, partner registration with name and city fields, and redirects active partners to their dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PendingApprovalV: Displays a pending approval status page for users whose registration is under admin review, showing registration details and a waiting message.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationFlow: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/RoleBadge.tsx: Renders styled badge components for different user roles (superadmin, admin, finance, client, partner, etc.) with role-specific colors and labels.
frontend/src/components/SuperadminClaimP: A React component that allows the first authenticated user to claim superadmin privileges, displaying a card with claim button, success/error alerts, and redirecting to dashboard after successful claim.
frontend/src/components/UserInfoPage.tsx: Displays the current user's profile information including name, role, and status with formatted badges and timestamps, showing a loading state while fetching data.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Admin page for managing users with search functionality, combining pending and active users from multiple queries, displaying user statistics cards and a management table with refresh capabilities.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Table component displaying user data with actions to approve/reject pending users, copy principal IDs, edit roles, and showing status badges with loading states for async operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApprovalManagement: Provides React Query hooks for user approval operations including listing approvals, approving/rejecting users, and managing approval status with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, tasks, and admin operations (approve/reject users) using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegistration.ts: Provides mutation hooks for self-registration of clients, partners, and internal users, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminClaim.ts: Implements hooks to check if a superadmin exists and to claim superadmin privileges, invalidating user-related queries after claiming.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a premium boutique theme supporting light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH, typography, container queries, animations, and a premium design system.
project_state.json: Project state tracking a fix for superadmin role authorization failure in an internal ticketing system. Contains 6 pending action requests to add #superadmin variant to UserRole enum, update isAdmin function to recognize superadmin role, and synchronize role assignment between main.mo and access-control.mo modules.
